title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4115.6 - Effect of scratch of horse on post position
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4115.6 - Effect of scratch of horse on post position

State Regulations

If a horse is scratched or withdrawn from the start, horses with post positions outside of that of the withdrawn horse, may move one
post position closer to the rail. In the event there are two tiers of horses, the withdrawing of a horse that has drawn or earned a position in the front
tier shall not affect the position of the horses that have drawn or earned
positions in the second tier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4115.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
